actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to enlarge the boundaries of the Grand Canyon National Park in the State of Arizona, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Revises the boundaries of Grand Canyon National Park in the State of Arizona. Authorizes appropriations necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to enlarge the boundaries of the Grand Canyon National Park in the State of Arizona, and for other purposes.
